translation.en: Hello. My name's Forrest, Forrest Gump.
translation.ja: やあ 僕はフォレスト･ガンプ

translation.en: Do you want a chocolate?
translation.ja: チョコレート どうです？

translation.en: I could eat about a million-and-a-half of these.
translation.ja: 僕は150万個 食べられる

translation.en: My mama always said,
translation.ja: ママは言ってた

translation.en: "Life was like a box of chocolates."
translation.ja: “人生はチョコレートの箱みたい”って

translation.en: You never know what you're gonna get.
translation.ja: “食べるまで中身は分からない”

translation.en: Those must be comfortable shoes.
translation.ja: はき心地がよさそうだ

translation.en: I bet you could walk all day in shoes like that and not feel a thing.
translation.ja: 一日 歩き続けても足が痛くならない

translation.en: I wish I had shoes like that.
translation.ja: 僕も そんな靴が欲しい

translation.en: My feet hurt.
translation.ja: 痛いわよ

translation.en: [munches] Mama always said "There's an awful lot you can tell about a person by their shoes."
translation.ja: ママは言ってた“靴で人が分かる”って

translation.en: Where they're going, where they've been.
translation.ja: どこから来て どこへ行くか

translation.en: I've worn lots of shoes.
translation.ja: 僕も たくさん靴をはいた

translation.en: I bet if I think about it real hard I could remember my first pair of shoes.
translation.ja: 最初の靴を一生懸命 思い出してみよう

translation.en: Mama said they'd take me anywhere.
translation.ja: ママは言った “好きな所へ”

translation.en: She said they was my magic shoes.
translation.ja: “これは魔法の靴よ”

translation.en: All right, Forrest, you can open your eyes now.
translation.ja: フォレスト　目を開けて

translation.en: Let's take a little walk around.
translation.ja: 歩いてみろ

translation.en: How do those feel?
translation.ja: どうだ？

translation.en: His legs are strong, Mrs. Gump, as strong as I've ever seen.
translation.ja: 脚は強い何も問題はありません

translation.en: But his back's as crooked as a politician.
translation.ja: 背骨が政治家のようにゆがんでる

translation.en: But we're going to straighten him right up now, aren't we, Forrest?
translation.ja: これで まっすぐになる

translation.en: [Forrest] Now, when I was a baby, Mama named me
translation.ja: ママは僕に南北戦争の英雄ネイサン･フォレストの名を⸺

translation.en: after the great Civil War hero General Nathan Bedford Forrest.
translation.ja: ママは僕に南北戦争の英雄ネイサン･フォレストの名を⸺ 付けた

translation.en: -[piano music playing] -[Forrest] She said we was related to him in some way. And what he did was,
translation.ja: 血がつながってるとママは言ったが⸺

translation.en: he started up this club called the Ku Klux Klan.
translation.ja: 彼はＫＫＫというクラブを作った

translation.en: They'd all dress up in their robes and their bedsheets
translation.ja: 頭巾(ずきん)とシーツをかぶって⸺

translation.en: and act like a bunch of ghosts or spooks or somethin'.
translation.ja: ユーレイのマネみたいな事をする連中だ

translation.en: They'd even put bedsheets on their horses and ride around.
translation.ja: 馬にまでシーツをかぶせた

translation.en: And, anyway, that's how I got my name, Forrest Gump.
translation.ja: とにかく それが“フォレスト･ガンプ”の由来だ

translation.en: Mama said that the Forrest part was to remind me
translation.ja: “人間はバカな事をする”と戒めるため⸺

translation.en: that sometimes we all do things that, well, just don't make no sense.
translation.ja: ママは僕を“フォレスト”と名付けたらしい

translation.en: What are y'all starin' at?
translation.ja: 何 見てるの？

translation.en: Haven't you ever seen a little boy with braces on his legs before?
translation.ja: 脚装具をはめた子は初めて？

translation.en: Don't ever let anybody tell you they're better than you, Forrest.
translation.ja: 他人にバカにされてはダメよ

translation.en: If God intended everybody to be the same, he'd have given us all braces on our legs.
translation.ja: 神様が公平なら皆 脚装具をはめるべきなのよ

translation.en: [Forrest] Mama always had a way of explaining things so I could understand them.
translation.ja: ママは何でも僕が分かるように説明した

translation.en: We lived about a quarter mile off Route 17,
translation.ja: 僕の家は17号線から400メートル

translation.en: about a half mile from the town of Greenbow, Alabama. That's in the county of Greenbow.
translation.ja: アラバマ州グリーンボウの町から歩いて800メートル

translation.en: Our house had been in Mama's family since her grandpa's grandpa's grandpa
translation.ja: 家にはママの家族が⸺ おじいさんの おじいさんのおじいさんの時代から住んでる

translation.en: had come across the ocean about a 1000 years ago or somethin' like that.
translation.ja: おじいさんの おじいさんのおじいさんの時代から住んでる

translation.en: Since it was just me and Mama and we had all these empty rooms,
translation.ja: 使わない部屋が多いのでママは人に貸してる

translation.en: Mama decided to let those rooms out, mostly to people passing through,
translation.ja: 使わない部屋が多いのでママは人に貸してる 大抵は この辺を たまたま通りかかる旅の人たちだ

translation.en: like from, oh, Mobile, Montgomery, places like that.
translation.ja: 大抵は この辺を たまたま通りかかる旅の人たちだ

translation.en: And that's how me and Mama got money.
translation.ja: それが うちの収入

translation.en: Mama was a real smart lady.
translation.ja: ママは頭がよかった

translation.en: [Mrs. Gump] Remember what I told you, Forrest. You're no different than anybody else is.
translation.ja: フォレストお前は皆と同じなのよ

translation.en: Did you hear what I said, Forrest?
translation.ja: 忘れてはダメよ

translation.en: You're the same as everybody else. You are no different.
translation.ja: お前は皆と同じ何も違ってない

translation.en: Your boy's… different, Mrs. Gump.
translation.ja: 息子さんは⸺ 違ってます　奥さん

translation.en: Now, his I.Q. is 75.
translation.ja: 知能指数が75しかない

translation.en: Well, we're all different, Mr. Hancock.
translation.ja: 人は皆 それぞれ違ってますわ

translation.en: [Forrest] She wanted me to have the finest education, so she took me
translation.ja: ママは最高の教育を望み⸺ グリーンボウ郡立小学校の校長に会いに行った

translation.en: to the Greenbow County Central School. I met the principal and all.
translation.ja: グリーンボウ郡立小学校の校長に会いに行った

translation.en: [Mr. Hancock] I want to show you something, Mrs. Gump.
translation.ja: これを見て下さい

translation.en: Now, this is normal.
translation.ja: ここが普通の子供

translation.en: Forrest is right here.
translation.ja: 息子さんの知能は ここです

translation.en: The state requires a minimum I.Q. of 80 to attend public school, Mrs. Gump.
translation.ja: 公立小学校に入るには最低80の知能指数が必要です

translation.en: He's gonna have to go to a special school. Now, he'll be just fine.
translation.ja: 養護学校に入れる方が息子さんのためですよ

translation.en: What does normal mean anyway? He might be…
translation.ja: “普通”って何を指すの？確かに⸺

translation.en: a bit on the slow side…
translation.ja: 血のめぐりは悪いわ

translation.en: but my boy Forrest is gonna get the same opportunities as everyone else.
translation.ja: でも息子には皆と同じチャンスを与えます

translation.en: He's not going to some special school to learn how to retread tires.
translation.ja: 養護学校へは やりません

translation.en: We're talking about five little points here.
translation.ja: ５点 足りないだけでしょ？

translation.en: There must be something that can be done.
translation.ja: それぐらい何とか

translation.en: [chuckles] We're a progressive school system.
translation.ja: うちは進歩的な学校です

translation.en: We don't want to see anybody left behind.
translation.ja: 皆に機会を与えたい

translation.en: Is there a Mr. Gump, Mrs. Gump?
translation.ja: ご主人は おいでになるので？

translation.en: He's on vacation.
translation.ja: 主人は休暇ですの

translation.en: Well, your mama sure does care about your schooling, son.
translation.ja: 君のママは教育熱心だ

translation.en: You don't say much, do you?
translation.ja: 何も しゃべれんのか？

translation.en: "Finally, he had to try. It looked easy, but…"
translation.ja: “簡単そうだったので彼は決心しました”

translation.en: -"Oh, what happened. First, they--" -Mama, what's vacation mean?
translation.ja: “でも やってみると…” キュウカって何の事？

translation.en: -Vacation? -Where Daddy went?
translation.ja: パパの行ってる所？

translation.en: Vacation's when you go somewhere…

translation.en: and you don't ever come back.
translation.ja: 戻ってこない事よ

translation.en: [Forrest] Anyway, I guess you could say me and Mama was on our own.
translation.ja: 家族は僕とママの２人きり

translation.en: But we didn't mind.
translation.ja: 寂しくはなかった家はいつも⸺

translation.en: Our house was never empty. There was always folks coming and going.
translation.ja: 寂しくはなかった家はいつも⸺ 客が出たり入ったり

translation.en: -Supper! It's supper, everyone! Forrest! -My, my, that sure looks special.
translation.ja: 皆さん　お食事よ！

translation.en: [Forrest] Sometimes we had so many people staying with us that every room was filled with travelers, you know,
translation.ja: 時には部屋が旅人で満杯になる事もあった

translation.en: -folks living out of their suitcases… -[Mrs. Gump] Well, you go ahead and start.

translation.en: -and hat cases, and sample cases. -I can't find Forrest. Forrest!
translation.ja: 帽子箱に商品見本ケース

translation.en: [Forrest] One time, a young man was staying with us,
translation.ja: １度 泊まった若い男は⸺

translation.en: and he had him a guitar case.
translation.ja: 何とギター･ケースを持っていた

translation.en: Forrest. I told you not to bother this nice, young man.
translation.ja: フォレストおじゃまをしてはダメよ

translation.en: [Elvis] Oh, no, that's all right, ma'am. I… I was showing him a thing or two on the guitar here.
translation.ja: いいんですよ曲を披露してたんです

translation.en: Well, all right then. Supper's ready if y'all want to eat.
translation.ja: お夕食の用意ができたわ

translation.en: [Elvis] Yeah, that sounds good. Thank you, ma'am.
translation.ja: どうも　すぐ行きます

translation.en: Say, man, show me that crazy little walk you just did there. Slow it down, son.

translation.en: -[Forrest] I liked that guitar. -♪ And you know it ♪ [Forrest] It sounded good.
translation.ja: いいギターの音だ僕は気に入った

translation.en: I started moving around to the music, swinging my hips.
translation.ja: 僕は音楽に合わせて体を動かし⸺ 腰を振った

translation.en: [Forrest] This one night, me and Mama was out shoppin',

translation.en: and we walked by Vincy's furniture and appliance store, and guess what?
translation.ja: 電器店の前を通りかかってびっくりした

translation.en: -♪ You ain't nothin' but a hound dog ♪ -This is not for children's eyes.
translation.ja: 子供は見ないの

translation.en: [Forrest] Some years later, that handsome young man who they called the King…

translation.en: well, he sung too many songs.
translation.ja: 歌を歌いすぎて⸺

translation.en: Had himself a heart attack or something.
translation.ja: 心臓マヒを起こしたとか

translation.en: It must be hard bein' a king.
translation.ja: キングは大変なんだね

translation.en: You know, it's funny how you remember some things, but some things you can't.
translation.ja: 思い出せる事と出せない事がある

translation.en: You do your very best now, Forrest.
translation.ja: しっかり頑張って

translation.en: -I sure will, Mama. -[tires squeal]
translation.ja: 分かったよ　ママ

translation.en: [Forrest] I remember the bus ride on the first day of school very well.
translation.ja: 初めて学校へ行った日の事はよく覚えている

translation.en: Are you coming along?
translation.ja: 乗るの？

translation.en: Mama said not to be taking rides from strangers.
translation.ja: 知らない人の車に乗るなって

translation.en: This is the bus to school.
translation.ja: スクールバスよ

translation.en: I'm Forrest, Forrest Gump.
translation.ja: 僕はフォレスト･ガンプ

translation.en: -I'm Dorothy Harris. -Well, now we ain't strangers anymore.
translation.ja: 私はドロシー･ハリス もう知り合いだね？

translation.en: This seat's taken.
translation.ja: ここはダメ

translation.en: It's taken.
translation.ja: ダメだよ

translation.en: You can't sit here.
translation.ja: よそへ行け

translation.en: [Forrest] You know, it's funny what a young man recollects, 'cause I don't remember being born.

translation.en: I… I don't recall what I got for my first Christmas,

translation.en: and I don't know when I went on my first outdoor picnic but…

translation.en: I do remember the first time I heard the sweetest voice in the wide world.
translation.ja: でも この世で一番優しい声を聞いた時は⸺ 覚えている

translation.en: [young Jenny] You can sit here if you want.
translation.ja: ここに座っていいわよ

translation.en: -[orchestral music playing] -[Forrest] I had never seen anything so beautiful in my life.
translation.ja: 彼女みたいに美しい子を見たのは初めて

translation.en: She was like an angel.
translation.ja: 天使のようだった

translation.en: Well, are you gonna sit down, or aren't you?

translation.en: What's wrong with your legs?

translation.en: Um, nothing at all, thank you. My legs are just fine and dandy.

translation.en: [Forrest] I just sat next to her on that bus and had a conversation all the way to school.
translation.ja: 僕は彼女の隣に座ってずっと話し続けた

translation.en: My mama says back's crooked like a question mark.
translation.ja: 背骨が“？”の形なんだ

translation.en: [Forrest] And next to Mama, no one ever talked to me or asked me questions.

translation.en: Are you stupid or something?
translation.ja: あなた バカなの？

translation.en: Mama says, "Stupid is as stupid does."

translation.en: I'm Jenny.
translation.ja: あたしはジェニー

translation.en: I'm Forrest, Forrest Gump.
translation.ja: 僕はフォレスト･ガンプ

translation.en: [Forrest] From that day on, we was always together. Jenny and me was like peas and carrots.

translation.en: [Forrest] She taught me how to climb.
translation.ja: 木登りを教わり⸺

translation.en: [Forrest] I showed her how to dangle.

translation.en: [Forrest] She helped me learn how to read…

translation.en: and I showed her how to swing.

translation.en: Sometimes, we'd just sit out and wait for the stars.

translation.en: [young Forrest] Mama's gonna worry about me.
translation.ja: ママが心配してる

translation.en: Just stay a little longer.

translation.en: [Forrest] For some reason, Jenny didn't never want to go home.

translation.en: Okay, Jenny, I'll stay.
translation.ja: じゃ もう少しいるよ

translation.en: [Forrest] She was my most special friend.

translation.en: My only friend.

translation.en: Now my mama always told me that miracles happen every day.

translation.en: Some people don't think so, but they do.

translation.en: Hey, dummy!

translation.en: [boy 1] Are you retarded, or just plain stupid?

translation.en: [boy 2] Look, I'm Forrest Gimp.

translation.en: [young Jenny] Just run away, Forrest.

translation.en: Run, Forrest! Run away! Hurry!

translation.en: Come on! Look out, dummy. Here we come. We're going to get you!

translation.en: Run, Forrest, run! Run, Forrest!

translation.en: Run, Forrest! Run!
translation.ja: フォレスト　走って！

translation.en: [Forrest] Now you wouldn't believe it if I told you…
translation.ja: 信じないだろうけど⸺

translation.en: but I could run like the wind blows.
translation.ja: 風のように速く走れた

translation.en: From that day on, if I was going somewhere,
translation.ja: その日から どこへ行く時も⸺

translation.en: I was running.

translation.en: That boy sure is a runnin' fool.
translation.ja: あの子は いつも走ってるな

translation.en: [Forrest] Now remember how I told you that Jenny never seemed to wanna go home?

translation.en: Well, she lived in a house that was as old as Alabama. Her mama had gone up to heaven when she was five,
translation.ja: 彼女の家は古く５歳の時 彼女のママは天国へ

translation.en: and her daddy was some kind of a farmer.
translation.ja: パパは農業をしてた

translation.en: [young Forrest] Jenny?
translation.ja: ジェニー？

translation.en: [Forrest] He was a very loving man.
translation.ja: 優しいパパで⸺

translation.en: [young Forrest] Jenny? [Forrest] He was always kissing and touchin' her and her sisters.

translation.en: And then this one time, Jenny wasn't on the bus to go to school.
translation.ja: ある日 ジェニーはスクールバスに乗らなかった

translation.en: Jenny, why didn't you come to school today?

translation.en: Shh. Daddy's takin' a nap.
translation.ja: パパがお昼寝を

translation.en: -[thuds] -[Jenny's father] Jenny!
translation.ja: ジェニー！

translation.en: [Jenny's father] Jenny, where'd you run to?
translation.ja: ジェニー　どこへ行く！

translation.en: You better get back here, girl!
translation.ja: 早く戻って来い！

translation.en: [young Jenny] Pray with me, Forrest. Pray with me.

translation.en: -[Jenny's father] Jenny! -[Jenny] Dear God, make me a bird so I can fly far, far, far away from here.
translation.ja: 神様　ここから逃げられるよう鳥にして下さい…

translation.en: [Forrest] Mama always said that God is mysterious.
translation.ja: ママは言った“神様の働きは不思議だ”と

translation.en: -[Jenny's father] Jenny! -[Forrest] He didn't turn Jenny -into a bird that day. -[Jenny's father] You get back here! [Forrest] Instead…

translation.en: he had the police say Jenny didn't have to stay -in that house no more. -[dog snarls, barks]

translation.en: [Forrest] She went to live with her grandma just over on Creekmore Avenue,
translation.ja: 町のおばあさんに引き取らせた

translation.en: which made me happy 'cause she was so close.

translation.en: -[thunderclaps] -[Forrest] Some nights, Jenny'd sneak out

translation.en: and come on over to my house just 'cause she said she was scared.
translation.ja: 夜になると ジェニーは時々家を抜け出して来た “怖いから”と言ったが何が怖かったのか

translation.en: -Scared of what, I don't know. -[door creaking]

translation.en: [Forrest] But I think it was her grandma's dog. He was a mean dog.

translation.en: -[boy] Hey, stupid! -Quit it!

translation.en: -[boys laughing] -Run, Forrest, run!
translation.ja: 早く逃げて！

translation.en: -Hey! Did you hear me, stupid? -[hooting]

translation.en: -[Jenny] Run, Forrest! -[boy] Come on, get in the truck!

translation.en: Run, Forrest! Run!
translation.ja: フォレスト　走って！

translation.en: Run, Forrest!
translation.ja: フォレスト　走って！

translation.en: Now, it used to be I ran to get where I was going.
translation.ja: どこへ行く時も走ってたけど⸺

translation.en: I never thought it would take me anywhere.

translation.en: Who in the hell is that?
translation.ja: あいつは誰だ

translation.en: That there is Forrest Gump, coach.

translation.en: -Just a local idiot. -[pants]

translation.ja: 信じられるかい？僕は大学に入った

translation.en: Forrest, move it! Run! Run!

translation.en: Run, you stupid son of a bitch! Run!
translation.ja: もっと走れ！ ボケヤロー！

translation.en: He must be the stupidest son of a bitch alive, -but he sure is fast. [laughs] -Yeah! [laughs]

translation.en: [Forrest] Now, maybe it's just me, but college was very confusing times.

translation.en: Federal troops enforcing a court order integrated the University of Alabama today.
translation.ja: 本日 機動隊がアラバマ大の構内へ

translation.en: Two negroes were admitted but only after Governor George Wallace
translation.ja: ２人の黒人学生の入学に⸺

translation.en: had carried out his symbolic threat to stand in the schoolhouse door.
translation.ja: ウォレス知事は抗議を表明しました

translation.en: Earl, what's going on?

translation.ja: 何かあったら勇気など見せずに走って

translation.en: Okay.
translation.ja: 分かった

translation.en: Jenny.
translation.ja: ジェニー

translation.en: I'll write you all the time.
translation.ja: 毎日 手紙を書くよ

translation.en: [Forrest] And just like that, she was gone.
translation.ja: そのまま彼女は行ってしまった

translation.en: You come back safe to me. Do you hear?
translation.ja: 無事に戻って来るのよ

translation.en: [Forrest] Now they told us that Vietnam was going to be very different
translation.ja: ベトナムはアメリカと⸺ とても違った国だと聞かされてた

translation.en: from the United States of America.
translation.ja: とても違った国だと聞かされてた

translation.en: Except for all the beer cans and the barbecues, it was.
translation.ja: 缶ビールとバーベキュー以外は確かに違ってた

translation.en: Hey, I'll bet there's shrimp all in these waters.
translation.ja: この海にはエビがいるぞ

translation.en: They tell me these Vietnams is good shrimp.
translation.ja: エビの採れる国だ

translation.en: After we win this war and we take over everything,
translation.ja: 戦争に勝ってここを占領したら⸺

translation.en: we can get American shrimpers
translation.ja: エビの漁師をここに呼ぼう

translation.en: to come out here and shrimp these waters. And just shrimp all the time, man.
translation.ja: エビの漁師をここに呼ぼう 腰を抜かすほどエビが採れる

translation.en: You must be my FNG's.
translation.ja: お前らが新兵か

translation.en: Oh, get your hands down. Do not salute me.
translation.ja: 手を下げろ！ここでは敬礼するな

translation.en: There are goddamn snipers all around this area who'd love to grease an officer.
translation.ja: 士官だと分かると狙撃される

translation.en: I'm Lieutenant Dan Taylor. Welcome to fort platoon.
translation.ja: 小隊長のダン･テイラー中尉だ

translation.en: What's wrong with your lip?
translation.ja: その下唇は？

translation.en: -I was born with big gums, sir. -Yeah? Well, you better tuck that in.
translation.ja: 生まれつきです 引っ込めとけ地雷線に触るぞ

translation.en: Gonna get that caught on a trip wire.
translation.ja: 引っ込めとけ地雷線に触るぞ

translation.en: Where are you boys from in the world?
translation.ja: 出身は？

translation.en: -[Forrest] Alabama, sir! -[Bubba] Alabama, sir!
translation.ja: アラバマ州です！

translation.en: You twins?
translation.ja: 双子か？

translation.en: No. We are not relations, sir.
translation.ja: 血は つながってません

translation.en: Look, it's pretty basic here.
translation.ja: ここは厄介な所じゃない

translation.en: You stick with me and learn from the guys who've been in country a while, you'll be all right.
translation.ja: すべて おれと古参兵を見習ってりゃいい

translation.en: There is one item of GI gear that can be the difference between a live grunt and a dead grunt…
translation.ja: 生きてる兵隊と死んだ兵隊の違いは１つ

translation.en: socks. Cushioned sole, OD green.
translation.ja: ソックスだ 足を いつも清潔に保て

translation.en: Try and keep your feet dry. And when we're out humpin',
translation.ja: 足を いつも清潔に保て ソックスは休憩のたびに はき替えろ

translation.en: I want you boys to remember to change your socks whenever we stop.
translation.ja: ソックスは休憩のたびに はき替えろ

translation.en: The Mekong will eat a grunt's feet right off his legs.
translation.ja: メコン川は足を腐らす

translation.en: Sergeant Sims. Goddammit, where's that sling rope I said to order?
translation.ja: 軍曹！おれの注文したロープは？

translation.en: I put in the requisitions at battalion…
translation.ja: 発注してあります

translation.en: [Forrest] Lieutenant Dan sure knew his stuff.
translation.ja: 頼りになる上官だ

translation.en: I felt real lucky he was my lieutenant.
translation.ja: いい上官で僕は幸運だ

translation.en: He was from a long, great military tradition.
translation.ja: 軍人の家系に違いない

translation.en: Somebody in his family had fought and died…
translation.ja: 先祖は国のために戦い戦死した

translation.en: in every… single… American war.
translation.ja: アメリカが戦ったすべての戦争で

translation.en: -Goddammit, kick some ass. -I'm on it, lieutenant.
translation.ja: 催促しろ！

translation.en: [Forrest] I guess you could say he had a lot to live up to.
translation.ja: 彼は尊敬できる上官だ

translation.en: So, you boys from Arkansas, huh? Well…
translation.ja: アーカンソー出身か

translation.en: I been through there. Little Rock's a fine town.
translation.ja: リトルロックを知ってるがいい町だ

translation.en: Now, go shake down your gear. See the platoon sergeant. Draw what you need for the field.
translation.ja: 荷物を解いて 足りない物は軍曹に請求しろ

translation.en: If you boys are hungry, we got steaks burning right over here.
translation.ja: 腹が減ったらステーキがある

translation.en: Two standing orders in this platoon--
translation.ja: 隊律を忘れるなよ

translation.en: One, take good care of your feet.
translation.ja: 足を清潔に保て

translation.en: Two, try not to do anything stupid, like getting yourself killed.
translation.ja: バカはするな　特に敵に撃たれるような事はな

translation.en: I sure hope I don't let him down.
translation.ja: 命令に従うぞ

translation.en: [Forrest] I got to see a lot of the countryside. We would take these real long walks.
translation.ja: あちこちを歩いてこの国の方々を見た

translation.en: [Forrest] And we were always lookin' for this guy named Charlie.
translation.ja: 捜す相手はゲリラ(チャーリー)って奴だ

translation.en: [Forrest] It wasn't always fun.
translation.ja: 面倒な事もあった

translation.en: Lieutenant Dan was always getting these funny feelings
translation.ja: 小隊長は道を歩いててヘンだとヒラめくと⸺

translation.en: about a rock or a trail or the road,
translation.ja: 小隊長は道を歩いててヘンだとヒラめくと⸺ こう怒鳴った“伏せて声を出すな！”

translation.en: so he'd tell us to… [imitates Dan] "Get down, shut up."
translation.ja: こう怒鳴った“伏せて声を出すな！”

translation.en: Get down! Shut up!
translation.ja: 伏せて声を出すな！

translation.en: [Forrest whispers] So we did.
translation.ja: 僕らは従った

translation.en: Now I don't know much about anything,
translation.ja: 僕だけの意見だけど⸺

translation.en: but I think some of America's best young men served in this war.
translation.ja: 皆 いい兵隊ばかりだった

translation.en: There was Dallas from Phoenix.
translation.ja: フェニックス出身の“ダラス”

translation.en: Cleveland, he was from Detroit.
translation.ja: デトロイト出身の“クリーブランド”

translation.en: [whispers] Hey, Tex.
translation.ja: “テキサス”

translation.en: Hey, Tex. Man, what the hell's going on?
translation.ja: “テキサス” 何か見えるか？

translation.en: [Forrest] And Tex was--
translation.ja: “テキサス”は…

translation.en: Well, I don't remember where Tex come from.
translation.ja: 彼は何州の出身かな？

translation.en: Fourth platoon, on your feet.
translation.ja: 第４小隊　立て！

translation.en: Y'all got ten clicks to go to that river. Move out.
translation.ja: すぐ先に川がある　移動しろ

translation.en: [Forrest] The good thing about Vietnam is there was always someplace to go.
translation.ja: ベトナムでは いつもどこか行く所があった

translation.en: Gump, check out that hole.
translation.ja: ガンプ　中を調べろ

translation.en: [Forrest] And there was always something to do.
translation.ja: 何かやる事もあった

translation.en: [Forrest] One day it started raining, and it didn't quit for four months.
translation.ja: ある日 雨が降り始めて４ヵ月 ずっと降り続けた

translation.en: We've been through every kind of rain there is,
translation.ja: あらゆる雨を経験した

translation.en: little bitty stinging rain…
translation.ja: 身を刺すような雨

translation.en: and big ol' fat rain,
translation.ja: ボタボタ降る大粒の雨

translation.en: rain that flew in sideways,
translation.ja: 横から吹きつける雨

translation.en: and sometimes rain even seemed to come straight up from underneath.
translation.ja: 時には下から吹きあげる雨もあった

translation.en: Shoot, it even rained at night.
translation.ja: 雨は夜も降り続けた

translation.en: -[Bubba] Hey, Forrest. -[Forrest] Hey, Bubba.
translation.ja: フォレスト

translation.en: I'm gon' to lean up against you. You lean your back against me.
translation.ja: 互いに寄りかかって寝よう

translation.en: This way we don't have to sleep with our heads in the mud.
translation.ja: 泥の中に倒れないで済む

translation.en: You know why we're a good partnership, Forrest?
translation.ja: お前とおれは相棒だ

translation.en: 'cause we be watching out for one another, like brothers and stuff.
translation.ja: 兄弟のように互いを気づかってる

translation.en: Hey, Forrest, somethin' I been thinking about.
translation.ja: 考えてた事がある

translation.en: I got a very important question to ask you.
translation.ja: 大切な事を尋ねたい

translation.en: How would you like to go into the shrimping business with me?
translation.ja: おれとエビ商売を始めないか？

translation.en: Okay.
translation.ja: いいよ

translation.en: Man, I tell you what. I got it all figured out, too.
translation.ja: 全部 経費を計算した

translation.en: So many pounds of shrimp will pay off the boat.
translation.ja: 船を買うのは幾らか

translation.en: So many pounds for gas. We can just live right on the boat. We ain't got to pay no rent.
translation.ja: ガソリン代もな船で寝起きすりゃ 安上がりだ

translation.en: I'll be the captain. We can just work it together,
translation.ja: おれが船長だが稼ぎは きっちり分ける

translation.en: split everything right down the middle. Man, I'm telling you, 50-50.
translation.ja: おれが船長だが稼ぎは きっちり分ける ５割ずつだ　それに好きなだけエビを食えるぞ

translation.en: And hey, Forrest, all the shrimp you can eat.
translation.ja: ５割ずつだ　それに好きなだけエビを食えるぞ

translation.en: That's a fine idea.
translation.ja: お前は頭がいい

translation.en: [Forrest] Bubba did have a fine idea.
translation.ja: ババは頭がよかった

translation.en: [Forrest] I even wrote Jenny and told her all about it.
translation.ja: ジェニーにも その事を書いた

translation.en: I sent her letters. Not every day, but almost.
translation.ja: ほとんど毎日 手紙を書いた

translation.en: I told her what I was doin' and asked her what she was doin'
translation.ja: 僕のしてる事を書き彼女のしてる事を尋ねた

translation.en: and told her how I thought about her always.
translation.ja: “いつも君を想ってる”と

translation.en: And how I was looking forward to getting a letter from her -just as soon as she had the time. -[dog barking]
translation.ja: “君の返事を待ちわびている”という事も書いた

translation.en: [Forrest] I'd always let her know that I was okay.
translation.ja: 無事だと知らせたかった

translation.en: Then I'd sign each letter "Love, Forrest Gump."
translation.ja: 手紙の最後は いつも同じ“愛をこめて フォレスト･ガンプ”

translation.en: [Forrest] This one day, we was out walking like always,
translation.ja: ある日いつものように歩いてると⸺

translation.en: and then, just like that,
translation.ja: 突然 何の前触れもなく⸺

translation.en: somebody turned off the rain, and the sun come out.
translation.ja: 誰かが雨を止め太陽が顔を出した

translation.en: -[Dan] Get that pig up here, goddammit! -Forrest! You okay?
translation.ja: 敵は あの茂みだ！

translation.en: Strongarm, Strongarm!
translation.ja: 本隊！ こちら“リマ６”！

translation.en: Hey, Dan! We got a man down!
translation.ja: 救急班！

translation.en: [Dan] Strongarm, this is Leg Lima 6! Over!
translation.ja: 森の中から攻撃を受けてる

translation.en: Roger, Strongarm! Be advised we have incoming from the tree line at point blue plus two! A.K.s and rockets!
translation.ja: 敵の武器はＡＫライフル銃とロケット砲

translation.en: Get that pig unfucked and on the tree line!
translation.ja: 早く敵に撃ち込め

translation.en: They got us, and it hurt. We're going to move 'em back to the blue line.
translation.ja: こちら負傷者多数ブルー･ラインまで後退する

translation.en: Pull back! Pull back!
translation.ja: 後退だ　後退しろ！

translation.en: Forrest! Run, Forrest!
translation.ja: フォレスト　走れ！

translation.en: -Pull back! -Run! Run! Run, man!
translation.ja: 後退だ！ フォレスト　走れ！

translation.en: Run, goddammit! Run! Get the hell out of here!
translation.ja: 何してる！ 走れ！

translation.en: [Forrest] I ran and ran just like Jenny told me to.
translation.ja: ジェニーの言葉通り僕は走った

translation.en: I ran so far so fast that pretty soon I was all by myself, which was a bad thing.
translation.ja: 走りすぎて独りになったここではマズい事だ

translation.en: Bubba.
translation.ja: ババは？

translation.en: [Forrest] Bubba was my best good friend. I had to make sure he was okay.
translation.ja: ババは親友だ無事を確かめねば

translation.en: Bubba!
translation.ja: ババ！

translation.en: And on my way back to find Bubba, well, there was this boy laying on the ground.
translation.ja: ババを捜しに戻る途中倒れてる奴を見つけた

translation.en: Tex.
translation.ja: “テキサス”

translation.en: [Forrest] I couldn't let him lay there all alone, scared the way he was,
translation.ja: ほったらかしには出来ない

translation.en: -so I grabbed him up… -[Tex groaning] [Forrest] …and run him out of there.
translation.ja: 彼をかつぎ上げて走った

translation.en: [Forrest] And every time I went back looking for Bubba,
translation.ja: ババを助けに戻るたびに声がした

translation.en: somebody else was saying, "Help me, Forrest, help me!"
translation.ja: ババを助けに戻るたびに声がした “フォレスト　助けてくれ”

translation.en: I started to get scared that I might never find Bubba.
translation.ja: ババは どこにいるのだろう

translation.en: I know my position is danger close!
translation.ja: ここにいたら全滅だ

translation.en: We got Charlie all over this area. I got to have those fast movers in here now. Over.
translation.ja: 敵に包囲されてる空から掃射してくれ

translation.en: [grunts] Lieutenant Dan, Coleman's dead!
translation.ja: こいつは死んでます

translation.en: I know he's dead! My whole goddamn platoon is wiped out!
translation.ja: 彼だけじゃない皆 やられちまった

translation.en: What are you doing?
translation.ja: 何する

translation.en: You leave me here! Get away. Just leave me here! Get out!
translation.ja: 何する！おれの事は ほっとけ！

translation.en: [groans, screams] God, I said leave me here, goddammit!
translation.ja: おれの事は ほっとけ！

translation.en: [man] Leg Lima 6, Leg Lima 6 this is Strongarm. Be advised your fast movers are inbound at this time. Over.
translation.ja: “リマ６”へ空からの応援を送る

translation.en: [Forrest] Then it felt like somethin' just jumped up and bit me.
translation.ja: その時 何かが尻を噛んだ

translation.en: You dang son of a bitch!
translation.ja: やめろ　バカヤロー！

translation.en: I can't leave the platoon. I told you to leave me there, Gump.
translation.ja: 隊を見捨てる事はできんさっきの場所へ戻せ！

translation.en: -Forget about me. Get yourself out! -[bombs exploding]
translation.ja: お前だけ早く逃げろ！

translation.en: Did you hear what I said?
translation.ja: 聞こえないのか？

translation.en: Gump, damn it, put me down.
translation.ja: 早く おれを下ろせ！

translation.en: Get your ass out of here. [groans]
translation.ja: お前は逃げろ

translation.en: I didn't ask you to pull me out of there, god damn, you--
translation.ja: 誰がおれを運べと言った？

translation.en: -Where the hell do you think you're going? -To get Bubba.
translation.ja: どこへ行く ババを

translation.en: [Dan] I got an air strike inbound right now. They're gonna nape the whole area.
translation.ja: 空からのナパーム攻撃がある

translation.en: Gump, you stay here! Goddammit! That's an order.
translation.ja: ここにいろ　命令だ！

translation.en: I gotta find Bubba!
translation.ja: ババを見つけなきゃ！

translation.en: Forrest.
translation.ja: フォレスト

translation.en: -Bubba. -I'm okay, Forrest.
translation.ja: ババ おれは大丈夫だ　心配ない

translation.en: I'm okay.
translation.ja: おれは大丈夫だ　心配ない

translation.en: [hesitating] Oh… oh, Bubba, no.
translation.ja: ババ　大変だ

translation.en: [Bubba] I'll be all right.
translation.ja: 大丈夫　助かるよ

translation.en: [Forrest] If I'd have known this was gonna be the last time me and Bubba was gonna talk,
translation.ja: これが最後だと知ってたら⸺

translation.en: I'd of thought of something better to say.
translation.ja: もっと何か考えて話したのに

translation.en: Hey, Bubba.
translation.ja: やあ ババ

translation.en: [pants] Hey, Forrest.
translation.ja: やあ フォレスト

translation.en: Forrest…
translation.ja: フォレスト

translation.en: why did this happen?
translation.ja: なぜ こんな事に？

translation.en: [Forrest] You got shot.
translation.ja: 撃たれたのさ

translation.en: Then Bubba said something I won't ever forget.
translation.ja: それからババは一生 忘れられない事を言った

translation.en: I want to go home.
translation.ja: うちへ帰りたい

translation.en: [Forrest] Bubba was my best good friend.
translation.ja: ババは僕の親友だった

translation.en: And even I know that ain't something you can find just around the corner.
translation.ja: 親友は どこにでもいるわけじゃない

translation.en: Bubba was gonna be a shrimping boat captain,
translation.ja: エビ採り船の船長になるはずが⸺

translation.en: but instead, he died right there by that river in Vietnam.
translation.ja: ベトナムで死んでしまった

translation.en: That's all I have to say about that.
translation.ja: 言えるのは それだけだ

translation.en: It was a bullet, wasn't it?
translation.ja: 弾丸だったのか？

translation.en: A bullet?
translation.ja: 弾丸？

translation.en: That jumped up and bit you.
translation.ja: 噛みついた物さ

translation.en: Oh. Yes, sir. Bit me directly in the buttocks.
translation.ja: そうです僕の尻に噛みついたんです

translation.en: They said it was a million-dollar wound but…
translation.ja: 皆は“100万ドルのケガだ”って

translation.en: the Army must keep that money 'cause I still ain't seen a nickel of that million dollars.
translation.ja: 金は軍隊が取ったらしく僕は見てません

translation.en: The only good thing about being wounded in the buttocks is the ice cream.
translation.ja: ケガして１つよかったのは⸺ 好きなだけアイスクリームをもらえた事だ

translation.en: They gave me all the ice cream I could eat.
translation.ja: 好きなだけアイスクリームをもらえた事だ

translation.en: And guess what? A good friend of mine was in the bed right next door.
translation.ja: それに隣のベッドには友達がいた

translation.en: Lieutenant Dan, I got you some ice cream.
translation.ja: ダン小隊長アイスクリームです

translation.en: Lieutenant Dan, ice cream!
translation.ja: アイスクリームですよ

translation.en: [nurse] It's time for your bath, lieutenant.
translation.ja: 中尉　入浴ですよ

translation.en: Gump.
translation.ja: ガンプ　ガンプ

translation.en: -Gump! -I'm Forrest Gump.
translation.ja: 僕です

translation.en: Mcmill.
translation.ja: “ジェニー･カラン様”

translation.en: Johnson.
translation.ja: “宛先人 この住所に見当たらず 返送します”

translation.en: Gump, how can you watch that stupid shit? Turn it off.
translation.ja: ガンプ　くだらんテレビなんか消しちまえ

translation.en: -[soldier] Good catch, Gump. -[ball bounces]
translation.ja: ナイス･キャッチ

translation.en: You know how to play this?
translation.ja: やるか？

translation.en: Come on. Let me show you. Here.
translation.ja: 教えてやるよ

translation.en: Now, the secret to this game is, no matter what happens,
translation.ja: ゲームに勝つコツは１つだ何があろうと⸺

translation.en: never, ever… take your eye off the ball.
translation.ja: 絶対に球から目を離さない事だ

translation.en: [Forrest] For some reason, ping-pong came very natural to me.
translation.ja: 僕はなぜかピンポンと性が合った

translation.en: See? Any idiot can play.
translation.ja: ほらな　バカでも出来る

translation.en: [Forrest] So I started playing it all the time.
translation.ja: 僕はピンポンに凝り⸺

translation.en: I played ping-pong even when I didn't have anyone to play ping-pong with.
translation.ja: 相手のいない時でも１人で球を打った

translation.en: [Forrest] The hospital's people said it made me look like a duck in water,
translation.ja: 皆は僕の事を“水を得た魚のようだ”と

translation.en: whatever that means.
translation.ja: どういう事かな？

translation.en: Even Lieutenant Dan would come and watch me play.
translation.ja: ダン小隊長まで見物に来た

translation.en: I played ping-pong so much, I even played it in my sleep.
translation.ja: ピンポンにとりつかれてラケットを持って寝た

translation.en: [breathes heavily] Now, you listen to me. We all have a destiny.
translation.ja: 人間には持って生まれた運命ってものがある

translation.en: Nothing just happens. It's all part of a plan!
translation.ja: 最初から決められてるんだ

translation.en: I should have died out there with my men,
translation.ja: 部下と戦死すべきだったのに⸺

translation.en: but now I'm nothing but a goddamn cripple,
translation.ja: おれの このザマを見ろ！

translation.en: a legless freak! Look. Look! Look at me!
translation.ja: 両脚がないんだぞよく見ろ！

translation.en: You see that? Do you know what it's like not to be able to use your legs?
translation.ja: もう二度と歩けないんだぞ貴様に分かるか？

translation.en: W… y… y… yes, sir, I do.
translation.ja: 分かります

translation.en: Did you hear what I said? [breathes heavily]
translation.ja: 話が分かったのか？

translation.en: You cheated me!
translation.ja: 貴様のせいだ！

translation.en: I had a destiny. I was supposed to die in the field with honor!
translation.ja: おれは戦場で名誉の戦死を遂げるはずだった

translation.en: That was my destiny, and you… cheated me out of it!
translation.ja: そういう運命を貴様がぶち壊したんだ！

translation.en: [Forrest] It's funny, but in the middle of all that fun, I began to think about Jenny,
translation.ja: この騒ぎの中で僕はジェニーの事を考えた

translation.en: [Forrest] …wondering how she was spending her new year's night out in California.
translation.ja: 彼女は大晦日(おおみそか)の夜をカリフォルニアで？

translation.en: Happy new year, Lieutenant Dan!
translation.ja: 新年おめでとう！

translation.en: Oh! What are you, stupid or something? What's your problem?
translation.ja: 何すんのよ　バカ！ひどいわ！

translation.en: -[laughs] -What's his problem? Did… did you lose your pecker in the war or something?
translation.ja: 戦争でアレを吹っ飛ばされたの？

translation.en: -What, is your friend stupid or something? -What did you say?
translation.ja: 何だと？

translation.en: I said, "Is your friend stupid or something?"
translation.ja: あいつ バカなの？

translation.en: [grunts] Don't call him stupid!
translation.ja: “バカ”と呼ぶな！

translation.en: -[Lenore] Hey, don't you push her! -[Dan] You shut up! -Don't you ever call him stupid! -[Carla] What's the matter, baby? -Why you're being so upset, huh? -[Dan] Just get the hell outta here!
translation.ja: “バカ”と呼んだら許さんぞ！とっとと うせろ！

translation.en: -and get the hell out of here! -You should be in a sideshow.
translation.ja: メス豚どもめ！

translation.en: -Go on! Get outta here! -You big loser!
translation.ja: 出てけ！

translation.en: I'm sorry I ruined your New Year's Eve party, Lieutenant Dan.
translation.ja: せっかくの夜をすみません

translation.en: She tastes like cigarettes.
translation.ja: あの女 タバコの味で…

translation.en: [Forrest] I guess Lieutenant Dan figured there's some things you just can't change.
translation.ja: 人には それぞれ嫌いなものがある

translation.en: He didn't want to be called crippled just like I didn't want to be called stupid.
translation.ja: 小隊長は“身障者”という言葉僕は“バカ”という言葉だ

translation.en: Happy new year, Gump.
translation.ja: 新年おめでとう

translation.en: The U.S. ping-pong team
translation.ja: ニクソン大統領が卓球チームを激励

translation.en: met with President Nixon today at an Oval Office ceremony……
translation.ja: ニクソン大統領が卓球チームを激励 数ヵ月後⸺

translation.en: Wouldn't you know it… a few months later, they invited me and the ping-pong team to visit the White House.
translation.ja: 卓球チームがホワイトハウスに招待された

translation.en: So I went… again.
translation.ja: それで僕は また行った

translation.en: And I met the president of the United States again.
translation.ja: そして また合衆国大統領に会った

translation.en: Only this time, they didn't get us rooms in a real fancy hotel.
translation.ja: 今度は安いホテルだった

translation.en: So, are you enjoying yourself in our nation's capital, young man?
translation.ja: 首都訪問を楽しんでるかね？

translation.en: -Yes, sir. -Well, where are you staying?
translation.ja: ホテルは？

translation.en: It's called the Hotel Ebbott.
translation.ja: アボット･ホテルです

translation.en: Oh, no, no, no. I know a much nicer hotel.
translation.ja: 新築の いいホテルがある

translation.en: It's brand-new. Very modern. I'll have my people take care of it for you.
translation.ja: 新築の いいホテルがある そっちへ移りたまえ

translation.en: -[security guard] Security. Frank Wills. -Yeah. Sir,
translation.ja: 警備係ですが…

translation.en: you might want to send a maintenance man over to that office across the way.
translation.ja: 向かいのビルに電気屋をやった方がいい

translation.en: The lights are off and they must be looking for a fuse box,
translation.ja: ヒューズが飛んだらしい

translation.en: or something 'cause them flashlights, the… they're keeping me awake.
translation.ja: 懐中電灯の光で眠れないんだよ

translation.en: -[Forrest] Thank you. -[security guard] No problem.
translation.ja: よろしく

translation.en: Therefore… I shall resign the presidency effective at noon tomorrow.
translation.ja: 私は⸺ 合衆国大統領を辞任します

translation.en: Vice President Ford
translation.ja: フォード副大統領が⸺

translation.en: will be sworn in as president at that hour in this office.
translation.ja: 明日 この執務室で大統領の宣誓を行います

translation.en: Forrest Gump.
translation.ja: ガンプ軍曹

translation.en: -Yes, sir! -As you were. I have your discharge papers. Service is up, son.
translation.ja: 休め　君の除隊書類だ長い間 ご苦労だった

translation.en: Does this mean I can't play ping-pong no more?
translation.ja: ピンポンは できないので？

translation.en: [officer] For the Army, it does.
translation.ja: 陸軍のためにはな

translation.en: [Forrest] And just like that, my service in the United States Army was over.
translation.ja: こうして僕の軍隊生活は終わってしまった

translation.en: So I went home.
translation.ja: 僕は故郷(くに)へ戻った

translation.en: I'm home, Mama.
translation.ja: 戻ったよ

translation.en: I know. I know.
translation.ja: 分かってるわ

translation.en: -Louise, he's here. -[Forrest] Now, when I got home, -I had no idea… -He's here, everybody! [Forrest] …but Mama had all sorts of visitors.
translation.ja: 僕の留守中に大勢の客がうちに来ていた

translation.en: We've had all sorts of visitors, Forrest.
translation.ja: 大勢のお客が来たのよ

translation.en: Everybody wants you to use their ping-pong stuff.
translation.ja: “うちの商品を使ってくれ”って

translation.en: One man even left a check for 25,000 dollars
translation.ja: ラケットを宣伝してくれって⸺ ２万5000ドルの小切手を置いてった人も

translation.en: if you'd be agreeable to sayin' you like using their paddle.
translation.ja: ２万5000ドルの小切手を置いてった人も

translation.en: Oh, but, Mama. I only like using my own paddle.
translation.ja: 自分のラケットがある

translation.en: -Hi, Miss Louise. -Hey, Forrest.
translation.ja: ルイーズ

translation.en: I know that, I know that but it's 25,000 dollars, Forrest.
translation.ja: それは分かってるけど⸺ ２万5000ドルの小切手よ

translation.en: I thought maybe you could hold it for a while, see if it grows on you.
translation.ja: 持っていれば手に なじむかもよ

translation.en: [Forrest] That mama, she sure was right. It's funny how things work out.
translation.ja: ママは正しかった世の中は本当に不思議だ

translation.en: I didn't stay home for long because I'd made a promise to Bubba, -and I always try to keep my promise. -[children clamoring]
translation.ja: ババとの約束を守るために僕は すぐ家を離れた

translation.en: [Forrest] So I went on down to Bayou La Batre to meet Bubba's family and make their introduction.
translation.ja: 僕はババの家族に会いにバイユー･ラ･バトルへ行った

translation.en: Are you crazy or just plain stupid?
translation.ja: あんた 気は確か？それともバカなの？

translation.en: Stupid is as stupid does, Mrs. Blue.
translation.ja: バカをする者がバカです

translation.en: I guess.
translation.ja: そうね

translation.en: [Forrest] And, of course, I paid my respect to Bubba himself.
translation.ja: もちろんババの墓参りもした

translation.en: Hey, Bubba. It's me, Forrest Gump.
translation.ja: ババ　フォレスト･ガンプだよ

translation.en: I remember everything you said, and I got it all figured out.
translation.ja: 君の言った通りに全部 計算したよ

translation.en: I'm taking the 24,562 dollars and 47 cent.
translation.ja: 僕の持ってる金は２万4562ドル47セント 少し使ったからね

translation.en: that I got, that it… that's left after a new haircut and a new suit and took Mama out to a real fancy dinner,
translation.ja: 散髪に行って 背広を買ってママとレストランで食事

translation.en: and I bought a bus ticket, then three Dr. Peppers.
translation.ja: バス代とドクターペッパー３本

translation.en: [shrimper] Tell me something.
translation.ja: 驚いたな

translation.en: -Are you stupid or something? -Stupid is as stupid does, sir.
translation.ja: あんた バカかね？ バカをする者がバカです

translation.en: Well, that's what's left after me saying,
translation.ja: こういう宣伝をした

translation.en: "When I was in China on the all-America ping-pong team,
translation.ja: “僕が中国へ行った時⸺”

translation.en: I just loved playing ping-Pong with my Flex-O-Lite ping-pong paddle,"
translation.ja: “愛用したのはライト印のラケット”

translation.en: which everybody knows isn't true, but Mama said it was just a little white lie, so it wouldn't hurt nobody.
translation.ja: 誰にでも分かる嘘だからママは構わないと

translation.en: [inhales] So anyway, I'm putting all that on gas
translation.ja: とにかく その金でガソリンと⸺

translation.en: ropes, and new nets and a brand-new shrimpin' boat.
translation.ja: ロープと網 エビ採り船を買った

translation.en: [Forrest] Now Bubba told me everything he knew about shrimping, but you know what I found out?
translation.ja: エビ採りの方法はババから聞いていたけど⸺

translation.en: Shrimping is tough.
translation.ja: 採るのは難しかった

translation.en: I only caught five.
translation.ja: ５尾だ

translation.en: A couple more, you can have yourself a cocktail. [chuckles]
translation.ja: あと２尾でカクテルが作れる

translation.en: Hey, you ever think about namin' this old boat? It's bad luck to have a boat without a name.
translation.ja: 船に名前を付けないからツキがないのさ

translation.en: [Forrest] I'd never named a boat before, but there was only one I could think of,
translation.ja: 船の名なんて初めてだけど付けるとしたら１つ

translation.en: the most beautiful name in the wide world.
translation.ja: 世界で一番 美しい名前だ

translation.en: [Forrest] Now, I hadn't heard from Jenny in a long while,
translation.ja: 手紙は来なかったけど⸺

translation.en: but I thought about her a lot.
translation.ja: いつも彼女の事を想い⸺

translation.en: And I hoped whatever she was doin' made her happy.
translation.ja: 幸せでいるようにと祈っていた

translation.en: [Forrest] I thought about Jenny all the time.
translation.ja: 僕は彼女を想い続けた

translation.en: Lieutenant Dan, what are you doing here?
translation.ja: ダン小隊長！こんな所で何を？

translation.en: Well, thought I'd try out my sea legs.
translation.ja: 海で運だめしをしたくてね

translation.en: Well, you ain't got no legs, Lieutenant Dan.
translation.ja: 脚が ないのに？

translation.en: Yes, I know that.
translation.ja: 分かってる

translation.en: You wrote me a letter, you idiot.
translation.ja: 手紙をくれたろ？

translation.en: Well, well. Captain Forrest Gump. I had to see this for myself. [chuckles]
translation.ja: フォレスト･ガンプ船長の姿をこの目で見たくてね

translation.en: I told you if you were ever a shrimp boat captain,
translation.ja: それに 言っただろ？“お前が船長になったら⸺”

translation.en: that I'd be your first mate. Well, here I am. I'm a man of my word.
translation.ja: “おれは一等航海士だ”とね約束を守ったのさ

translation.en: Yeah, but don't you be thinking that I'm going to be calling you "sir."
translation.ja: 言っとくがお前を“サー”とは呼ばんぞ

translation.en: No, sir.
translation.ja: 分かってます

translation.en: It's my boat.
translation.ja: あれです

translation.en: [Dan] I have a feeling if we head due east,
translation.ja: いい予感がする 東へ舵を取れ

translation.en: we'll find some shrimp, so take a left.
translation.ja: エビがいる　左へ回せ

translation.en: -Take a left! -[Forrest] Which way?
translation.ja: 左だ どっちです？

translation.en: Over there! They're over there!
translation.ja: あっちだ　あっち！

translation.en: Get… get on the wheel and take a left.
translation.ja: 舵を左へ回すんだ！

translation.en: Gump, what are you doing? Take a left! Left!
translation.ja: ガンプ　何してる！反対だ　左だ！

translation.en: That's where we're gonna find those shrimp, my boy! [laughs]
translation.ja: 今度こそ大漁だぞ

translation.en: That's where we'll find them.
translation.ja: 見てろよ

translation.en: -Still no shrimp, Lieutenant Dan. -Okay, so I was wrong.
translation.ja: １尾も いませんよ 勘が外れたのさ

translation.en: Well, how are we gonna find them?
translation.ja: どこに いるんです？

translation.en: Well, maybe you should just pray for shrimp.
translation.ja: 神に祈るんだな

translation.en: [Forrest] So I went to church every Sunday.
translation.ja: 毎日曜 教会に通った

translation.en: Sometimes Lieutenant Dan came, too, though I think he left the praying up to me.
translation.ja: 小隊長も時々 来たが祈るのは僕の役目だった

translation.en: No shrimp.
translation.ja: ダメです

translation.en: Where the hell's this God of yours?
translation.ja: 頼りない神だな

translation.en: It's funny Lieutenant Dan said that
translation.ja: 本当に偶然だったが⸺

translation.en: 'cause right then, God showed up.
translation.ja: その時 神の力が働いた

translation.en: [Dan] You'll never sink this boat!
translation.ja: この船は沈まんぞ！

translation.en: Now, me, I was scared…
translation.ja: 僕は怖くて震えてたが⸺

translation.en: -[Dan laughing] Whoo! -[Forrest] …but Lieutenant Dan, -he was mad. -[Dan] Come on!
translation.ja: ダン小隊長は荒れまくった

translation.en: You call this a storm?
translation.ja: こんなものが嵐か？

translation.en: Blow, you son of a bitch! Blow!
translation.ja: 笑わせるな！もっと風を吹かせてみろ

translation.en: It's time for a showdown! You and me!
translation.ja: 貴様と おれの対決だ！ おれは逃げも隠れもせんぞ！

translation.en: I'm right here! Come and get me! [laughing hysterically]
translation.ja: おれは逃げも隠れもせんぞ！ おれを打ちのめせ！

translation.en: You'll never sink this boat! [laughing hysterically]
translation.ja: 貴様の力でこの船を沈めてみろ！

translation.en: Hurricane Carmen came through here yesterday,
translation.ja: ハリケーン“カルメン”は⸺

translation.en: destroying nearly everything in its path.
translation.ja: 多大の損害を与え⸺

translation.en: And as in other towns up and down the coast, Bayou La Batre's entire shrimping industry
translation.ja: 特に沿岸のエビ漁業は壊滅的な被害を受け⸺

translation.en: has fallen victim to carmen and has been left in utter ruin.
translation.ja: 漁船がこのような姿をさらしています

translation.en: Speaking with local officials, this reporter has learned,
translation.ja: 関係者の話では嵐に耐えた⸺

translation.en: in fact, only one shrimping boat actually survived the storm.
translation.ja: エビ採り船は たったの１隻

translation.en: Louise. Louise, there's Forrest.
translation.ja: ルイーズ　フォレストよ！

translation.en: [Forrest] After that, shrimping was easy.
translation.ja: それからは大漁続き

translation.en: [Forrest] And since people still needed them shrimps
translation.ja: エビはシュリンプ･カクテルやバーベキューに必要で⸺

translation.en: for shrimp cocktails and barbecues and all and we were the only boat left standin',
translation.ja: エビはシュリンプ･カクテルやバーベキューに必要で⸺ 僕らのババ＝ガンプ社のエビは売れに売れた

translation.en: Bubba Gump Shrimp's what they got.
translation.ja: 僕らのババ＝ガンプ社のエビは売れに売れた

translation.en: We got a whole bunch of boats. Twelve Jennys.
translation.ja: 持ち船も増えてジェニー号は12隻

translation.en: A big ol' warehouse. We even have hats that say "Bubba Gump" on them.
translation.ja: 大きな倉庫に社名入りの野球帽

translation.en: Bubba Gump Shrimp.
translation.ja: ババ＝ガンプ社の名は有名になった

translation.en: -It's a household name. -Hold on there, boy.
translation.ja: ババ＝ガンプ社の名は有名になった 待てよ

translation.en: Are you tellin' me you're the owner of the Bubba Gump Shrimp Corporation?
translation.ja: 君がババ＝ガンプ･エビ会社の社長だと言うのかね？

translation.en: Yes. We got more money than Davy Crockett.
translation.ja: ええ　景気のいい会社です

translation.en: [laughs] Boy, I heard some whoppers in my time, but that tops 'em all. [laughing]
translation.ja: こんな大ボラを吹く奴は初めてだよ！

translation.en: We were sittin' next to a millionaire.
translation.ja: こいつが百万長者だとさ

translation.en: Well, I thought it was a very lovely story,
translation.ja: とにかく楽しいお話だったわ

translation.en: and you tell it so well, with such enthusiasm.
translation.ja: あなたが とてもうまく一生懸命 話したから

translation.en: Would you like to see what Lieutenant Dan looks like?
translation.ja: ダン小隊長の写真を？

translation.en: [woman] Well, yes, I would.
translation.ja: ええ　拝見したいわ

translation.en: [Forrest] That's him right there.
translation.ja: これです

translation.en: -Mm. -[Forrest] And let me tell you something about Lieutenant Dan.
translation.ja: もう少し 小隊長の話を

translation.en: Forrest…
translation.ja: フォレスト

translation.en: I never thanked you for saving my life.
translation.ja: 命を救ってくれた礼を言うよ

translation.en: [Forrest] He never actually said so,
translation.ja: 口では言わなかったが⸺

translation.en: but I think he made his peace with God.
translation.ja: 小隊長は神と仲直りしたのだ

translation.en: [reporter] For the second time in 17 days,
translation.ja: 17日の間で２度目の⸺

translation.en: President Ford escaped possible assassination today.
translation.ja: フォード大統領の暗殺未遂事件です

translation.en: -Jenny 1. Go, Margo. -[Margo] Forrest has a phone call.
translation.ja: フォレストに電話よ

translation.en: Yeah, well, you'll have to tell them to call him back.
translation.ja: かけ直せと言ってくれ

translation.en: -He is indisposed at the moment. -[Margo] His mama's sick.
translation.ja: 今は ご気分が悪い お母さんが病気なの

translation.en: -Where's Mama? -She's upstairs.
translation.ja: ママは？ ２階よ

translation.en: Hi, Forrest.
translation.ja: まあ フォレスト

translation.en: -[doctor] I'll see you tomorrow. -Oh, all right.
translation.ja: では明日

translation.en: We sure got you straightened out, didn't we, boy?
translation.ja: まっすぐに伸びたな

translation.en: What's the matter, Mama?
translation.ja: 病気なの？

translation.en: I'm dying, Forrest.
translation.ja: じき死ぬのよ

translation.en: Come on in, sit down over here.
translation.ja: ここに来て座って

translation.en: Why are you dying, Mama?
translation.ja: なぜ死ぬの　ママ？

translation.en: It's my time. It's just my time.
translation.ja: そういう時が来たのよそういう時がね

translation.en: Oh, now…
translation.ja: いいわね？

translation.en: don't you be afraid, sweetheart.
translation.ja: 死を怖がらないで

translation.en: Death is just a part of life.
translation.ja: 生の一部なんだから

translation.en: Something we're all destined to do.
translation.ja: 誰も逃げられない運命(さだめ)なの

translation.en: I didn't know it,
translation.ja: 私が⸺

translation.en: but I was destined to be your mama.
translation.ja: お前のママになったように

translation.en: I did the best I could.
translation.ja: 私なりに努力したわ

translation.en: [Forrest] You did good, Mama.
translation.ja: 最高のママさ

translation.en: I happen to believe you make your own destiny.
translation.ja: 自分の運命は自分で決めるの

translation.en: You have to do the best with what God gave you.
translation.ja: 神様の贈り物を生かして

translation.en: What's my destiny, Mama?
translation.ja: 僕の運命って？

translation.en: You're gonna have to figure that out for yourself.
translation.ja: それは自分で見つけるのよ

translation.en: Life is a box of chocolates, Forrest. You never know what you're gonna get.
translation.ja: 人生はチョコレートの箱食べるまで中身は分からない

translation.en: [Forrest] Mama always had a way of explaining things so I could understand them.
translation.ja: ママは何でも僕が分かるように説明した

translation.en: I will miss you, Forrest.
translation.ja: 別れるのは悲しいわ

translation.en: She had got the cancer
translation.ja: ママは癌(がん)だった

translation.en: and died on a Tuesday.
translation.ja: 火曜日に死んだ

translation.en: I bought her a new hat with little flowers on it.
translation.ja: 花のついた帽子を買ってあげた

translation.en: And that's all I have to say about that.
translation.ja: この話は それだけだ

translation.en: Didn't you say you were waiting for the number seven bus?
translation.ja: ７番のバスですよ

translation.en: There'll be another one along shortly.
translation.ja: また すぐ次のが来るわ

translation.en: Now because I had been a football star and a war hero
translation.ja: 僕はフットボールのスターで戦争の英雄

translation.en: and national celebrity and a shrimping boat captain
translation.ja: 有名人で エビ採り船の船長

translation.en: and a college graduate, the city fathers of Greenbow, Alabama,
translation.ja: それに大学卒 市議会は僕に特別の仕事をくれた

translation.en: decided to get together and offered me a fine job.
translation.ja: 市議会は僕に特別の仕事をくれた

translation.en: So I… I never went back to work for Lieutenant Dan.
translation.ja: 小隊長との仕事は それっきり

translation.en: Though he did take care of my Bubba Gump money.
translation.ja: でも小隊長は僕の金を⸺

translation.en: He got me invested in some kind of fruit company.
translation.ja: どこかのフルーツ会社に投資してくれて⸺

translation.en: And so then I got a call from him saying,
translation.ja: “一生 食う金には困らない”と 〝アップルコンピュータ 〞

translation.en: "We don't have to worry about money no more." And I said,
translation.ja: “一生 食う金には困らない”と 〝アップルコンピュータ 〞 お陰で１つ心配が減ったわけです

translation.en: "That's good. One less thing."
translation.ja: お陰で１つ心配が減ったわけです

translation.en: Now Mama said there's only so much fortune a man really needs,
translation.ja: ママは言ってた“必要以上の金は⸺”

translation.en: -and the rest is just for showing off. -[reverend] Praise the Lord.
translation.ja: “意味のない無駄な金”と

translation.en: [Forrest] So I gave a whole bunch of it to the Foursquare Gospel Church,
translation.ja: それで一部をごっそり教会へ寄付

translation.en: And I gave a whole bunch to the Bayou La Batre Fishing Hospital
translation.ja: 一部は入り江の漁師共済病院へ

translation.en: [Forrest] And even though Bubba was dead and Lieutenant Dan said I was nuts,
translation.ja: 小隊長は僕がイカれてると言ったけど⸺

translation.en: You were.
translation.ja: 君もいたよ

translation.en: I love you.
translation.ja: 愛してるわ

translation.en: [Forrest] You died on a Saturday morning.
translation.ja: 君は土曜の朝 死んだ

translation.en: And I had you placed here under our tree.
translation.ja: 僕らの木の下に君を埋めた

translation.en: And I had that house of your father's bulldozed to the ground.
translation.ja: 君のパパの家はブルドーザーで潰したよ

translation.en: Mama…
translation.ja: ママは⸺

translation.en: always said that dyin' was a part of life.
translation.ja: よく言っていた“死は生の一部なのよ”と

translation.en: I sure wish it wasn't.
translation.ja: でも悲しい

translation.en: Little Forrest is…
translation.ja: 小さなフォレストは⸺

translation.en: he doin' just fine.
translation.ja: 元気だよ

translation.en: [Forrest] About to start school again soon,
translation.ja: また学校へ通いだす

translation.en: and I make his breakfast, lunch, and dinner every day.
translation.ja: 毎日 ３度の食事は僕が⸺ 作ってる

translation.en: I make sure he…
translation.ja: そして毎日⸺

translation.en: combs his hair and brushes his teeth every day.
translation.ja: 髪をとかし 歯を磨かせている

translation.en: Teaching him how to play ping-pong.
translation.ja: ピンポンも教えてる

translation.en: [Forrest] He's really good.
translation.ja: とても うまい

translation.en: We fish a lot.
translation.ja: 釣りもする

translation.en: And every night, we read a book. He's just so smart, Jenny.
translation.ja: 本も読む　とても利口な子だ

translation.en: [sniffles] You'd be so proud of him.
translation.ja: 君にも見せたい

translation.en: I am.
translation.ja: 自慢できる

translation.en: He, uh, wrote you a… a letter.
translation.ja: あの子からの手紙だよ

translation.en: And he says I can't read it. I'm not supposed to, so I'll just leave it here for you.
translation.ja: 読むなと言われたからここに置いておく

translation.en: Jenny… [hesitates]
translation.ja: ジェニー

translation.en: I don't know if Mama was right or if it… if it's Lieutenant Dan.
translation.ja: 僕には分からない正しいのはママなのか⸺ ダン小隊長だったのか

translation.en: I don't know…
translation.ja: ダン小隊長だったのか

translation.en: if we each have a…
translation.ja: 僕らには皆 運命(さだめ)が⸺

translation.en: destiny…
translation.ja: あるのか⸺

translation.en: or if we're all just floatin' around accidental-like on a breeze…
translation.ja: それとも⸺ 風に乗ってただ さまよってるのか

translation.en: but I… I think…
translation.ja: たぶん⸺

translation.en: maybe it's both.
translation.ja: その両方だろう

translation.en: Maybe both is happening at the same time.
translation.ja: 両方が同時に起こってる

translation.en: But I miss you, Jenny.
translation.ja: 君が恋しいよ

translation.en: If there's anything you need…
translation.ja: 欲しいものがあったら⸺

translation.en: I won't be far away.
translation.ja: いつでも呼んでくれ

translation.en: Here's your bus.
translation.ja: バスが来たよ

translation.en: I know this.
translation.ja: この本か

translation.en: I'm gonna share that for show-and-tell because grandma used to read it to you.
translation.ja: おばあちゃんがよくパパに読んだ本でしょ？

translation.en: My favorite book.
translation.ja: 大好きな本だ

translation.en: Hey, Forrest… don't--
translation.ja: フォレスト　待って

translation.en: I wanted to tell you I love you.
translation.ja: お前を愛してる

translation.en: I love you, too, Daddy.
translation.ja: 僕もだよ　パパ

translation.en: I'll be right here when you get back.
translation.ja: ここで待ってるよ

translation.en: You understand this is the bus to school, now, don't you?
translation.ja: これはスクールバスよ

translation.en: Of course, and you are Dorothy Harris, and I'm Forrest Gump.
translation.ja: あなたはドロシー僕はフォレスト･ガンプ
